popov-blinds.name: Blinds
popov-blinds.author: Popov Andrey
popov-blinds.description: A control of blinds up/down/stop + status

settings.label: Item
settings.description: Item of blinds. You will send commands to it like "UP", "STOP", "DOWN"

settings.label: Percentage item
settings.description: Item that shows status of blinds from 0  to 100

settings.label: Slider in read only mode
settings.description: Check it if you are not able to set accurate blinds position
